cause.description:
In our country of Trinidad and Tobago we are having a serious crisis. Doubles has risen to the prices of $3 when will the cease. You can only by 3 doubles with $10 and not even get a Coca Cola or our favorite Apple J.
1. To bring it to a $1 again
2. To fill our bellies with more
3. To have more money in our pocket after we buy the doubles
cause.name: Doubles for a $1
